name: Standard Mayonnaise
description: Hellmann's is a fine product. But homemade mayonnaise is something entirely different. It is perfectly delicious spread on sandwiches, but it can also become the foundation of a more complex dipping sauce or dressing. Make sure you use a mildly flavored oil so the richness of the egg, as fresh as you can find, can shine.
recipeIngredient: Sliver of a garlic clove, crushed
1 cup peanut oil or vegetable oil

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, whisk together egg yolk, garlic, mustard, lemon juice and a large pinch salt. Beginning a drop at a time, whisk in oil. As it emulsifies, add oil a little faster, in a slow steady stream. When mixture is thick, taste and adjust seasoning. It should be highly seasoned.
